channel.title: Client error in cmd prompt
channel.description:
Hi, when one of the members from my server tries to log in, they get the following error in the cmd prompt as well as a black screen that freezes their client:
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.OutOfM at Model.(Model.java:175) at Model.method462(Model.java:123) at ObjectDef.method581(ObjectDef.java:2 at ObjectDef.method578(ObjectDef.java:1 at ObjectManager.method175(ObjectManage at ObjectManager.method190(ObjectManage at client.method22(client.java:417) at client.method54(client.java:2424) at client.loadingStages(client.java:237 at client.mainGameProcessor(client.java at client.processGameLoop(client.java:1 at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:109) at client.run(client.java:4243) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
EDIT: Figured it out... Never mind.

item.title: Client error in cmd prompt
